SEARCH
Module com.example.myuno
Package com.example.myuno.model.card

Interface Card

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
DrawFourCard, DrawTwoCard, NumberCard, SkipCard, WildCard
public interface Card extends Serializable
Represents a generic UNO card.

All specific card types (e.g., number cards, action cards, wild cards) implement this interface. This interface defines the basic structure and essential behavior of any playable UNO card.

    Enumeration of possible card colors used in the UNO game.

  • Field Details

    • BACK_IMAGE

      static final javafx.scene.paint.ImagePattern BACK_IMAGE
      Static constant representing the image pattern used for the back of all cards. This is displayed when a card is hidden from the player (e.g., in the opponent's hand).

  • Method Details

    • getPathImage

      String getPathImage()
      Returns the path to the image file that graphically represents this card.
      Returns:
      a string containing the relative path to the image

    • getColor

      Card.Color getColor()
      Returns the color associated with this card.
      Returns:
      the Card.Color value of this card

    • canBePlayedOver

      Boolean canBePlayedOver(Card card)
      Evaluates whether this card can be legally played over another card. The logic varies by card type and may involve matching color, number, or type.
      Parameters:
      card - the card currently visible at the top of the discard pile
      Returns:
      true if this card may be played over the given card; false otherwise
